name: User Import for BuddyPress (All Fields)
author: Manoj Kumar

sections.description:
You can import all users with all xprofile fields to your BuddyPress installation.

This plugin will automatically activate all user accounts and send notification as selected by the admin at the time of import.

It currently works with WordPressMU + BuddyPress installation.

History

  • 1.0 – First release for BuddyPress RC1.

Contact

If you have any issue with this plugin, need help, or have any suggestions, You may contact me at http://manojkumar.org or www.futurescape.in.
sections.installation:
• Unzip files in /wp-content/mu-plugins
  • It should look like
    • /wp-content/mu-plugins/bp-user-import-adv.php
    • /wp-content/mu-plugins/bp-user-import-adv/
    • /wp-content/mu-plugins/bp-user-import-adv/bp-user-import-adv-functions.php
  • No need to activate this plugin

short_description: With this plugin you can import users with all fields to your Wordpress MU + BuddyPress installation.
